title: Aazhi Alai Lyrics Vizhithru
stanzas:
Aazhi alai neerum
thaedaamal thinam thaedum
thaedal karaiyin oaram

oru seiyaaga urumaari
thaaiyaagi enai thaanga
vaan thandha pon dhevathai

en vizhi pona pinnaalum
vazhiyaagi oliyaagi
oli kaattum siru venpirai

unai tholaithaen
naan vaadinen
nee varum paadhai
thaedinen en poo anname

Aazhi alai neerum
thaedaamal thinam thaedum
thaedal karaiyin oaram
